block.p: GRUMAN--Beatrice. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the loss of Beatrice Gruman, beloved mother of Stuart Gruman, whose leadership as a member of the Electrical Division executive committee has strengthened our ability to serve those in need. We extend our deepest sympathies to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.
